channel.title: Monsters hit to high and have to much hp?
channel.description:
Hey, i made my own sever following a tut (thanks) but i got a slieght proplem, my monsters hp's is way to to high and they hit really high as well, how can i change this?
thanks heaps gorey

item.title: Monsters hit to high and have to much hp?
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

changing its level should do the trick.

Read full topic

item.title: Monsters hit to high and have to much hp?
item.dc:creator: @tajkillerscape tajkillerscape
item.description:
@tajkillerscape wrote:

Well i know how to edit the hp of the monster’s… Just go into your npc.cfg and you will see npc’s name’s just press Ctrl+f and search the name of the monster, then as soon as you found the monster you would like scroll too the left and there will be some number’s edit the number of hp the monster has and put it too what you want it to be.

Read full topic
item.source: Monsters hit to high and have to much hp?
